featured.text: The prickly pear cactus is such a powerful symbol in Mexico that it occupies a prime spot on Mexico’s national flag.
One former prime minister considered it important enough to reveal in his official profile that he was a type A, while his opposition rival was type B.
Why did Prime Minister Ryu Matsumoto resign from office?

definition.en_def: A prime number is a natural number greater than 1 that cannot be formed by multiplying two smaller natural numbers; also means primary or most important.
definition.example: Two and three are both prime numbers.
